basic.name: Basic (Desi)
scenarios: Your parents catch you talking to a person of the opposite gender. What is your explanation?
You accidentally send a screenshot of a chat to the person you were talking about. How do you recover?
The rishta (matchmaking) photo looks nothing like you. What is the caption?
You are at a wedding and the paneer finishes. What do you do?
Traffic police catches you without a license. What is your excuse?
You forget to touch an elder's feet. What curse do they mutter?
Your mom finds the bill for the 'drinks' you had with friends. What did you actually buy?
You try to explain 'Netflix and Chill' to your Dad. What do you say it means?
The auto driver agrees to go by the meter. What is the catch?
You get added to a family WhatsApp group. What is the first message you see?
Your maid takes a leave on the day of your house party. What is her reason?
You are caught sleeping in the office post-lunch. What were you dreaming about?
A random uncle gives you unsolicited advice on the metro. What is it?
You wear ripped jeans in front of your Dadi. What does she offer you?
You order 'medium spicy' and it burns your tongue. What do you tell the waiter?
Your friend says 'I'll pay you back tomorrow.' When do you actually get the money?
You walk into a glass door at a mall. How do you pretend it was intentional?
The neighbor asks for your Wi-Fi password. What is the password?
You are asked to sing at a family gathering. What song do you choose?
You find 500 rupees in old jeans. What do you spend it on immediately?
responses: One plate Pani Puri, extra teekha.
Bas 2 minute mein pahunch raha hoon.
Engineering degree holder, working in sales.
Tu jaanta nahi mera baap kaun hai.
Putting a cover on the TV remote.
Saying 'On the way' while still in bed.
Using a plastic bag to store other bags.
Slapping the remote to make it work.
Only here for the free food.

edgier.name: Edgier (Spicy)
scenarios: I told my parents I was _____, but I was actually _____ with someone.
My Mom thinks I'm _____, but I'm really _____ on the side.
The last time I lied to my Dad was about _____, which was actually _____.
My arranged marriage rishta left because I was _____ and _____.
I got caught by my Dadi _____, and I told her it was for _____.
The reason my family thinks I'm still _____ is because I _____ them.
My boss doesn't know I'm actually _____ instead of _____.
The biggest lie I tell at family gatherings is that I'm _____ and not _____.
My Instagram says I'm _____, but my browser history says I'm _____.
I survived marriage talks by pretending to be _____ and _____.
The thing I hide from my parents is that I'm _____ and _____.
My relatives think I'm still _____, but really I'm _____.
I lied on my resume about _____, now I have to _____ to keep the job.
The real reason I don't visit home often is because I'm _____ and _____.
My therapist says my mommy issues come from being _____ and _____.
responses: seeing someone my caste would never approve of
mentally checked out from this relationship
compromising my dreams for this family
one bad decision away from fame
a disaster in a designer outfit

office.name: Office (Corporate Chaos)
scenarios: I replied-all to my boss with _____, which made everyone think I was _____.
My manager doesn't know I spend half my day _____ instead of _____.
I told HR I was _____ when I was actually _____ the whole time.
The reason our project failed was because I _____, but I blamed _____.
My team thinks I'm _____, but really I'm just _____ and faking it.
I survived the layoffs by _____ and pretending to be _____.
In the last meeting, I agreed to _____ but I'm definitely going to _____.
My performance review says I'm _____, but my email drafts say I'm _____.
I get through the workday by _____ and convincing everyone I'm _____.
The most chaotic thing happened when I _____ and then _____ to cover it up.
My Slack status says I'm _____, but I'm actually _____ at home.
I lied in the interview about _____, and now I have to _____ to keep it.
The real reason I skipped the meeting was _____, which is totally _____.
My team has no idea I'm _____ them by _____.
I'd have quit by now if it wasn't for _____ and _____.
responses: a TED talk away from enlightenment

superEdgy.name: Super Edgy (Go Bonkers)
superEdgy.description: No holds barred, absolutely wild humor
scenarios: I got caught by my partner _____, so I told them _____.
The most embarrassing thing my body did was _____, and I blamed _____.
My secret addiction is _____, and I hide it by _____.
If people knew what I actually thought about _____, they would _____.
The last time I faked an orgasm was because _____, not because _____.
I get horny when _____, which is why I avoid _____.
My wildest fantasy involves _____ and _____.
I've lied to my partner about _____ because _____.
The worst place I've done it was _____, and we almost got caught by _____.
I'm pretty sure my therapist knows I'm _____, but we never talk about _____.
My browsing history would traumatize _____ but arouse _____.
If my friends knew I was into _____, they'd think I was _____.
The number of times I've faked being sick for _____ is absolutely _____.
I've definitely cheated at _____ by _____.
My parents still think I'm a virgin because _____.
The most awkward boner I've gotten was during _____, in front of _____.
I've ghosted someone because they were _____ and _____.
The reason I hate _____ is because _____ happened.
My most toxic trait is that I _____ instead of _____.
If I had a dollar for every time I _____, I'd have enough to _____.
responses: my therapist finding my second phone
sexually confused but making it work
watching things that horrify my parents
lying about my body count by several hundred
that thing I could never say at dinner
a complete maniac in the best way
my standards have left the building
situations that should stay in Vegas
regrets I'll take to my grave
way more than therapy can handle
